name: rentmyCastle
description: rentmyCastle is a website that helps students find the perfect space near their college. It uses reactJS and appwrite as the main technologies for front-end and back-end development. rentmyCastle aims to provide a simple and user-friendly interface for students to browse, compare and book their ideal accommodation.

name: TechTrivia
description: Sangeet is an android app made with python using the Kivy and kivyMD. It can play, pause, next, previous and add music from folder.
